benchmark_details.name: Test of Time (ToT)
benchmark_details.overview: ToT is a benchmark designed to assess LLMs' temporal reasoning abilities through two distinct tasks focused on temporal semantics and arithmetic, enabling a comprehensive evaluation.
similar_benchmarks: TEMPTABQA (Temporal Question Answering for Semi-Structured Tables)

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: The objective of ToT is to provide a rigorous and informative assessment of LLMs' temporal reasoning capabilities.

data.source: Synthetic dataset generated using controlled graph structures and temporal relationships.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on model performance across the different question types in the benchmark.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates a better understanding of temporal reasoning.
methodology.baseline_results: Results evaluated using Claude-3-Sonnet, GPT-4, and Gemini 1.5 Pro.
methodology.validation: Extensive experiments conducted to validate model performance.

targeted_risks.harm: Potential for misuse in generating misleading temporal information.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: No sensitive or personal data included.
